summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Drainage and Wastewater Utility of The City of Seattle, Washington; specifying and adopting a system or plan of additions and betterments to and extensions of the Drainage and Wastewater Utility; providing for the issuance of revenue bonds in the aggregate principal amount of not to exceed forty-five million dollars ($45,000,000) for the purpose of (1) providing part of the funds to pay the cost of carrying out a portion of certain systems or plans of the Drainage and Wastewater Utility; (2) paying the costs of refunding the callable portion of the City's outstanding Drainage and Wastewater Utility Revenue Bonds, 1990, and (3) providing for a reserve and paying the costs of issuing such bonds; providing for the terms of the bonds; providing for the confirmation of the sale and final terms of the bonds and the refunding plan by resolution; and ratifying, confirming and approving actions heretofore taken.
